metadata.title: Game Title
metadata.desc: Cool game with cool map and puzzle.
metadata.help: Guide how to play the game

front garden.desc: You stand in a front garden with a door leading into a mansion.

puzzles.name: welcome mat
puzzles.desc: You can peak under the welcome mat.

puzzles.name: front door
puzzles.desc: You must use the front door key to open the door.

main hall.desc: You stand before a big main hall with rooms on every side.

npc.name: Butler
npc.dialogue: There may be a statue with no eye in here than may give a key to unlock a door if you may find its eye, maybe.

puzzles.name: statue
puzzles.desc: You can put an eye in the statue located at the east door.

bathroom.desc: You are inside a bathroom with a very large bath.

puzzles.name: bathtub
puzzles.desc: There is an eye in the bathtub.

decrepit room.desc: There is only you and a table and chair in the middle of this empty room.

puzzles.name: will
puzzles.desc: There is a will of Â£0 and an Emmet LEGO figure for you RIP.
